title: Slim Goodbody - The Inside Story FLAC 24Bit 96KHz Vinyl
description:
Source: Vinyl LP (JB-86) 1974

Slim Goodbody - The Inside Story FLAC[24Bit 96KHz Vinyl] (Big Papi) 1974 Children's Music


*************************************************************************************

This is some really fun music for kids that teaches them about the human body.  There is also a very encouraging song that teaches kids to be who they are called Be What You Want To Be.  - Big Papi
***********************************************************************************

Side 1

A1		 Mr. Goodbody	2:15
A2		 Food Is The Fuel	3:26
A3		 Down Down Down	3:42
A4		 Your Mouth Is A House	3:26
A5		 Hair	3:40
A6		 The Muscle Hustle	2:35

Side 2

B1		 The Brain	3:15
B2		 Lubba-Dubba	3:03
B3		 One Is Connected To Two	2:35
B4		 Point Of A Joint	2:30
B5		 Breathing	1:43
B6		 Exercise	2:33
B7		 Be What You Want To Be	3:51

***********************************************************************************


John Burstein was born on December 25, 1949 in Mineola, New York. While working at The Floating Hospital in New York City he began writing songs and skits to entertain the children there and to teach them about anatomy and the workings of the human body. He eventually added an organ-painted body suit to the design, dubbing his alter-ego "Slim Goodbody".
